alert.note: Alert for Perry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 01 at 9:18AM EST until January 01 at 11:15AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Kentucky, including the following areas, Floyd, Knott, Letcher, Perry and Pike. * WHEN...Until 1115 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding of small streams and creeks, roads, and roadside culverts. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 913 AM EST, Doppler radar indicated scattered showers and thunderstorms containing heavy rainfall. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Pikeville, Hazard, Hindman, Bath, Elkhorn City, Wheelwright, Pippa Passes, Vicco, Melvin, Halo, Burton, Buckingham, Greenleaf, Ligon, Speight, Dry Creek, Hi Hat, Hall, Buckhorn Hollow and Price.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
